item.title: Giving of thanks, and tech support

blockquote.i: Next week, millions of college students and young professionals will head home for the Thanksgiving holidays. We'll sit with our families in warm, candle-lit dining rooms eating stuffed turkey, reminiscing over old photographs, preparing holiday shopping lists and Ã¢â‚¬Â¦ Please. Let's be frank. We are going home to fix our parents' computers.
